Name: GetCurrentAcceleration
Description: Checking if a character is actively accelerating (e.g., pressing movement keys).

Name: bOrientRotationToMovement
Description: If true, rotate the Character toward the direction of acceleration

Name: MaxWalkSpeed
Description: The maximum ground speed when walking. Also determines maximum lateral speed when falling.

Name: RotationRate
Description: Change in rotation per second, used when UseControllerDesiredRotation or OrientRotationToMovement are true. Set a negative value for infinite rotation rate and instant turns.
